objects.text:
Premium Anti-Aging Formula
Dual-System Beauty Technology
Luxurious Silver Packaging
Professional-Grade Results

product_details.name: MM Luxury Anti-Aging Skincare Set - Premium Beauty Duo
product_details.description:
• Premium silver-tone packaging for an luxurious aesthetic
• Professional-grade anti-aging formulation
• Dual-product system for comprehensive skincare
• Sleek, modern dispenser design for precise application
• Travel-friendly size and secure packaging
• Advanced moisturizing and skin perfecting technology
• High-end cosmetic grade materials
• Elegant minimalist design with MM branding
• Perfect for daily skincare routine
• Professional salon-quality beauty products

banner_details:
This banner showcases a luxury skincare product with a sleek and modern layout. The background features overlapping geometric waves and softly glowing circular gradients in deep and slate blues, creating a sophisticated and calming aesthetic. The "heading" text is large and elegant, emphasizing the premium nature of the product. The "subheading" text beneath it highlights the product name in soft silver tones, contributing to the luxurious feel. The "description" text lists key features in a concise column. The "price" is prominently bold and white, paired with the rupee symbol for clarity. A rounded "cta_background" button with the "cta" text invites user interaction. On the right, a sharp and modern "product_image" of two silver-toned bottles enhances the premium look.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue (#2C3E50)
- Slate Gray (#34495E)
- Soft Silver (#B2BEC3)
- Cloud White (#FFFFFF)
- Accented Gray (#A0A9AB)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern aesthetic, dominated by a monochromatic grayscale palette. Key colors include metallic silver (#C0C0C0), glossy gunmetal gray (#4A4A4A), shiny chrome (#E5E5E5), and harsh black (#000000), accented by clear reflective glass and water droplets. The silver tones blend smoothly with gradients, creating a high-end, futuristic appeal while the dark elements add contrast and depth. Highlights on the metallic surfaces enhance texture and dimension, making the product appear luxurious and premium. For an advertisement banner, a clean black or white background with glistening silver accents would elevate the sophistication and draw focus to the product's shine.
